meaningMnemonic: The <radical>imperial</radical> radical and the <kanji>imperial</kanji> kanji are exactly the same! Wahoo!
readingMnemonic: Who is the coolest <kanji>imperial</kanji> you know? <reading>Ryu</reading> (りゅう) from Street Fighter. Wait what? You mean he FIGHTS imperials? Oh, okay. Looks like Ryu is the coolest imperial FIGHTER you know!
